message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product.  I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. To make this a smooth transaction, I'm initially offering it at $20,000. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $12,000?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $20,000 represents the product's true value, I understand your budget constraints.  Could you meet me at $17,000?
I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $14,000?
